m_DataReceived.description: You can Ignore this it pretty much should always be 0

Servers.description: This is an array of servers that this players can transfer between

Name.description: The Name of the server MUST match ServerID in the UniversalApi.json

Map.description: The Name of the map the server is running. to be displayed to the player when transfering

Port.description: The Game port of the server

QueryPort.description: The Steam Query port of the server, used to check player count and queue count

Password.description: The password for the server, leave blank if no password

RespawnServer.description: This is the server that the players on this server will respawn to, if blank they can respawn on this server

Name.description: This is the name of the arrival point

SpawnPoints.description: An array of spawn points for the arrival point.

ServerName.description: This is the server that this spawnpoint is for, MUST match the ServerID in the UniversalApi.json and the 'Name' field in the servers array

DisplayName.description: The Display Name for the Spawn point to be displayed to the player

ProtectionTime.description: The amount of time(in Seconds) this will give players god mod and prevent them from raising guns and melee attack.

Positions.description: An array of position players can spawn at

X.description: The X coordinate of the spawn point

Y.description: The Y coordinate of the spawn point '-1' will spawn on ground

Z.description: The Z coordinate of the spawn point

D.description: The Direction the player will face when spawn (X cord of Orientation)

Radius.description: The respawn radius if used players will spawn on the ground

Chance.description: The chance this respawn point will be selected

DepaturePoints.description: The array of Depatures points, where players can interact with the terminal.

DisplayName.description: The display name for the terminal to show up in the GUI

ServerName.description: The server the Depature is on, MUST match the ServerID in the UniversalApi.json and the 'Name' field in the servers array

TerminalType.description: The Class Name for the terminal

Position.description: The Position for the Terminal must be within 0.7M or 20M if its a Hive_Terminal (will picked closest point)

ArrivalPoints.description: The array of Arrival Points that each depature point can travel too

ArrivalPointName.description: The Name of the ArrivalPoint MUST match Name in the array of Arrival Points

Icon.description: The Icon that is displayed for the arrival point, (plane, boat, car, bus, train, portal)

TransitionWaitTime.description: Time player has wait to trasnfer

AcceptedCurrencyId.description: Currency ID to transfer much match Currency's ID below

Icon.description: Icon for currency (coins, coins2, pound, starticket, rubble, yen, dollar, ticket, euro)

CanUseRuinedBills.description: Specifies if the player can use ruined bills/items
